name: ⊲Solitaire :)
description:
If you like playing Klondike Solitaire card game, this is the app for you, and we believe you will love it.

This is classic solitaire game on Windows that you already know, now it's on iOS platform and featured MultiPlayer function on Game Center. Felt bored with playing alone? You can now play on line against with multiple solitaire player come from world-wide. Send invitation to your friends and play with them, you and your friends will enjoy and love it.

Features:
⊲ Game Center Leaderboards.

⊲ Game Center MultiPlayer enabled.

⊲ Unlimited number of games.

⊲ Unlimited Undo/Redo and Hint.

⊲ Draw 1 card, and also Draw 3 cards.

⊲ Easy level and Regular level for both of solitaire beginners and experts.

⊲ Switchable layout, Right/Left hand and cards going to Right/Left just in one click.

⊲ Selective appearances: back cards, card spots, and background.

⊲ Timer/Move/Scores.

⊲ Standard, Vegas scoring system, and also cumulative Vegas is available.

⊲ Auto-Complete to finish solvable game.

⊲ Single tap or drag and drop to move cards.

⊲ Landscape and Portrait orientation, and also an option to lock it.

⊲ Statistic for all played games, wins, fastest time, fastest move, best scores and streaks.

⊲ Automatic game save and resume.

⊲ Universal on iPhone/iPad device, retina display, iOS7 and iPhone5(s)(c) is optimized.

⊲ ... too many to list ...
